trans-unit.source: Accessibility Access allows Mac Mouse Fix to intercept signals from your mouse and keyboard
trans-unit.target: Mac Mouse Fix가 마우스 및 키보드 신호에 접근하려면 손쉬운 사용 접근 권한이 필요합니다.

trans-unit.source: Move the mouse pointer inside the '+' field, then *Click* a mouse button to assign an action to it. You can also *Double Click*, *Click and Drag* and [more]().
trans-unit.target: 마우스 포인터를 '+' 영역 위에 두고, 마우스 버튼을 *클릭*하여 액션을 할당할 수 있습니다. *이중 클릭*이나 *클릭 및 드래그* [등의]() 동작도 가능합니다.

First draft: <Decrease Brightness key> || Example usage: Works like pressing '<Decrease Brightness Key>' on an Apple keyboard. || Note: Unlike in the interface builder `.strings` files, in `Localizable.strings`, <> doesn't mean that the text is unused. I think the usage of <> here is a little weird, so let me know if you have a better idea!
First draft: <Key without description>
First draft: Cancel

trans-unit.source: Beta versions can have many issues. Don't forget to give feedback when you run into one. Thanks!
trans-unit.target: 베타 버전을 사용하면 여러 문제를 겪을 수 있습니다. 문제를 발견하시는 경우 의견을 보내주세요. 감사합니다!
trans-unit.note: First draft: Beta versions can have many issues. Don't forget to give feedback when you run into one. Thanks!
First draft: Get Beta Versions
First draft: Get Beta Versions?

First draft: Double Click %@ +
First draft: Triple Click %@ +
First draft: Middle Button
First Draft: Button %@
First draft: Primary Button
First draft: Secondary Button

trans-unit.source: Middle Mouse Button (also called Scroll Wheel Button or Mouse Button 3)
trans-unit.target: 마우스 가운데 버튼(또는 스크롤 휠 버튼 및 마우스 3번 버튼)
trans-unit.note:
First draft: Middle Mouse Button (also called Scroll Wheel Button or Mouse Button 3) || Example usage: Open links in a new tab, paste text in the Terminal, and more.
Works like clicking the Middle Mouse Button (also called the Scroll Wheel Button or Mouse Button 3) on a standard mouse.
First draft: Mouse Button %@

trans-unit.source: Primary Mouse Button (also called Left Mouse Button or Mouse Button 1)
trans-unit.target: 마우스 주 버튼(또는 왼쪽 마우스 버튼 및 마우스 1번 버튼)
trans-unit.note: First draft: Primary Mouse Button (also called Left Mouse Button or Mouse Button 1)

trans-unit.source: Secondary Mouse Button (also called Right Mouse Button or Mouse Button 2)
trans-unit.target: 마우스 보조 버튼(또는 오른쪽 마우스 버튼 및 마우스 2번 버튼)
trans-unit.note: First draft: Secondary Mouse Button (also called Right Mouse Button or Mouse Button 2)

trans-unit.source: Get a mouse with 5+ buttons to unlock the full potential of Mac Mouse Fix!
trans-unit.target: 5개 이상의 버튼이 있는 마우스를 사용하면, Mac Mouse Fix의 기능을 최대로 활용할 수 있습니다!
trans-unit.note: First draft: Get a mouse with 5+ buttons to unlock the full potential of Mac Mouse Fix!
First draft: OK
First draft: Your mouse only has 3 buttons

Note: Value for this key is defined in Localizable.stringsdict, not Localizable.strings. || Note: The core idea that we want to convey here is that, from now on, the button is being 'intercepted' by Mac Mouse Fix. We used the word 'capture' instead of 'intercept' since it sounds friendlier in English. In your language, you might want to use something closer to 'intercept'.

trans-unit.source: are now captured by Mac Mouse Fix.
trans-unit.target: 은 이제 Mac Mouse Fix에서 캡처합니다.
trans-unit.note: Note: Value for this key is defined in Localizable.stringsdict, not Localizable.strings. || Note: The core idea that we want to convey here is that, from now on, the button is being 'intercepted' by Mac Mouse Fix. We used the word 'capture' instead of 'intercept' since it sounds friendlier in English. In your language, you might want to use something closer to 'intercept'.

Note: Value for this key is defined in Localizable.stringsdict, not Localizable.strings. || Note: The core idea that we want to convey here is that, from now on, the button is being 'intercepted' by Mac Mouse Fix. We used the word 'capture' instead of 'intercept' since it sounds friendlier in English. In your language, you might want to use something closer to 'intercept'.
Note: Value for this key is defined in Localizable.stringsdict, not Localizable.strings

trans-unit.source: **Scrolling** is now captured by Mac Mouse Fix.
trans-unit.note: First draft: **Scrolling** is now captured by Mac Mouse Fix.
First draft:
First draft: [Learn More](https://github.com/noah-nuebling/mac-mouse-fix/discussions/112)

trans-unit.source: **Scrolling** is no longer captured by Mac Mouse Fix.
trans-unit.note: First draft: **Scrolling** is no longer captured by Mac Mouse Fix.

trans-unit.source: Scrolling now works as if Mac Mouse Fix was disabled.
trans-unit.note: First draft: Scrolling now works as if Mac Mouse Fix was disabled.
First draft: Spaces & Mission Control

trans-unit.source:
Move your mouse: - Up to show Mission Control - Down to show Application Windows - Left or Right to move between Spaces
Works like swiping with 3 fingers on an Apple Trackpad
trans-unit.target:
마우스를 움직여 다음 동작을 수행합니다.: - 위로 올리면 Mission Control을 엽니다. - 아래로 내리면 현재 앱에 대해 열린 모든 윈도우를 보여줍니다. - 좌우로 움직이면 생성한 Spaces 사이를 이동합니다.
이는 Apple 트랙패드에서 세 손가락으로 스와이프하는 것과 같습니다.
trans-unit.note:
First draft: Move your mouse: - Up to show Mission Control - Down to show Application Windows - Left or Right to move between Spaces
Works like swiping with 3 fingers on an Apple Trackpad
First draft: Scroll & Navigate

trans-unit.source:
Scroll freely by moving your mouse in any direction
Also Navigate between pages in Safari, delete messages in Mail and more by moving your mouse left and right
Works like swiping with 2 fingers on an Apple Trackpad
trans-unit.target:
마우스가 움직이는 방향대로 자유롭게 스크롤합니다.
마우스를 좌우로 이동하면 Safari에서는 페이지를 쓸어넘길 수 있으며, Mail에선 메시지를 삭제할 수도 있습니다.
이는 Apple 트랙패드에서 두 손가락으로 스와이프하는 것과 같습니다.
trans-unit.note:
First draft: Scroll freely by moving your mouse in any direction
Also Navigate between pages in Safari, delete messages in Mail and more by moving your mouse left and right
Works like swiping with 2 fingers on an Apple Trackpad

First draft: Application Windows || Note: Under macOS Sonoma, this feature is called 'App Exposé' in Trackpad settings, but 'Application Windows' in Keyboard Shortcut settings and all other places I found.

trans-unit.source: Show all windows of the active app
trans-unit.target: 현재 앱에 대해 열린 모든 윈도우를 보여줍니다.
trans-unit.note: First draft: Show all windows of the active app

First draft: Look Up & Quick Look

trans-unit.source:
Look up words in the Dictionary, Quick Look files in Finder, and more.
Works like a Force click on an Apple Trackpad.
trans-unit.target:
사전에서 단어를 찾아보거나, Finder에서 파일을 훑어보는 등의 동작을 수행합니다.
이는 Apple 트랙패드에서 세게 클릭하는 것과 같습니다.
trans-unit.note:
First draft: Look up words in the Dictionary, Quick Look files in Finder, and more.
Works like a Force click on an Apple Trackpad.
First draft: Middle Click

trans-unit.source:
Open links in a new tab, paste text in the Terminal, and more.
Works like clicking %@ on a standard mouse.
trans-unit.target:
링크를 새로운 탭에서 열거나, 터미널에서 텍스트를 붙여넣는 등의 동작을 수행합니다.
이는 표준 마우스에서 %@를 클릭하는 것과 같습니다.
trans-unit.note:
First draft: Open links in a new tab, paste text in the Terminal, and more.
Works like clicking %@ on a standard mouse.

First draft: Smart Zoom

trans-unit.source:
Zoom in or out in Safari and other apps.
Works like a two-finger double tap on an Apple Trackpad.

Safari 등의 앱에서 콘텐츠를 확대하거나 축소합니다.
이는 Apple 트랙패드에서 두 손가락으로 이중 탭하는 것과 같습니다.
trans-unit.note:
First draft: Zoom in or out in Safari and other apps.
Works like a two-finger double tap on an Apple Trackpad.

trans-unit.source: If you have **problems enabling** the app, click [here](https://github.com/noah-nuebling/mac-mouse-fix/discussions/861).

trans-unit.source: **Primary Mouse Button** can't be used Please try another button
trans-unit.target: **마우스 주 버튼**은 사용할 수 없습니다. 다른 버튼으로 다시 시도하십시오.
trans-unit.note: First draft: **Primary Mouse Button** can't be used Please try another button

trans-unit.source: **Secondary Mouse Button** can't be used Please try another button
trans-unit.target: **마우스 보조 버튼**은 사용할 수 없습니다. 다른 버튼으로 다시 시도하십시오.
trans-unit.note: First draft: **Secondary Mouse Button** can't be used Please try another button

trans-unit.source: Mac Mouse Fix is currently free in your country (%@)
trans-unit.target: 사용자 국가(%@)에서 Mac Mouse Fix는 현재 무료로 제공됩니다.
trans-unit.note: First draft: Mac Mouse Fix is currently free in your country (%@)

trans-unit.source:
Mac Mouse Fix was **disabled** in System Settings
To enable Mac Mouse Fix:
1. Go to [Login Items Settings](x-apple.systempreferences:com.apple.LoginItems-Settings.extension) 2. Switch on 'Mac Mouse Fix.app'
trans-unit.target:
시스템 설정에서 Mac Mouse Fix가 **비활성화**되어있습니다.
Mac Mouse Fix를 사용하려면 다음 절차를 따르십시오:
1. [로그인 항목 설정](x-apple.systempreferences:com.apple.LoginItems-Settings.extension)을 엽니다. 2. 'Mac Mouse Fix.app' 항목을 허용합니다.
trans-unit.note:
First draft: Mac Mouse Fix was **disabled** in System Settings
To enable Mac Mouse Fix:
1. Go to [Login Items Settings](x-apple.systempreferences:com.apple.LoginItems-Settings.extension) 2. Switch on 'Mac Mouse Fix.app'

trans-unit.source:
Mac Mouse Fix can't be enabled because there's __another version__ of Mac Mouse Fix present on your computer
To enable Mac Mouse Fix:
1. Delete the [other version](%@) 2. Empty the Bin 3. Restart your Mac 4. Try again!
trans-unit.target:
컴퓨터에 **다른 버전의 앱**이 발견되어 Mac Mouse Fix를 사용할 수 없습니다.
Mac Mouse Fix를 사용하려면 다음 절차를 따르십시오:
1. [다른 버전](%@)을 제거합니다. 2. 휴지통을 비웁니다. 3. Mac을 재시동합니다. 4. 다시 시도합니다.
trans-unit.note:
First draft: Mac Mouse Fix can't be enabled because there's __another version__ of Mac Mouse Fix present on your computer
To enable Mac Mouse Fix:
1. Delete the [other version](%@) 2. Empty the Bin 3. Restart your Mac 4. Try again!
First draft: Enabling Failed
First draft: , || Note: This string joins elements in a list except the second-to-last and last one. || Note: The first draft contains a space after the comma.
First draft: %@ and %@ || Note: This format string joins the second-to-last element and the last elements in a list of items
First draft: Activate License
First draft: Deactivate License
First draft: Your license has been **activated**! 🎉

trans-unit.source:
This license has been activated **%d** times. The maximum is **%d**.
Because of this, the license has been invalidated. This is to prevent piracy. If you have other reasons for activating the license this many times, please excuse the inconvenience.
Just [reach out](mailto:noah.n.public@gmail.com) and I will provide you with a new license! Thanks for understanding.
trans-unit.target:
이 라이센스는 **%d회** 활성화되어있으며, 최대 **%d회**까지만 활성화할 수 있습니다.
불법 복제 방지를 위해 라이센스는 무효화되었습니다.
동일한 라이센스를 여러번 활성화해야할 다른 이유가 있을 경우, [연락](mailto:noah.n.public@gmail.com) 주시면 새 라이센스를 발급해드리겠습니다. 이해해주셔서 감사합니다.
trans-unit.note:
First draft: This license has been activated **%d** times. The maximum is **%d**.
Because of this, the license has been invalidated. This is to prevent piracy. If you have other reasons for activating the license this many times, please excuse the inconvenience.
Just [reach out](mailto:noah.n.public@gmail.com) and I will provide you with a new license! Thanks for understanding.
First draft: This license is **already activated**!
First draft: Your license has been **deactivated**

trans-unit.source: This license __could not be activated__ but Mac Mouse Fix is currently __free in your country__!
trans-unit.target: 라이센스가 **활성화되지 않았습니다**. 사용자 국가에서는 현재 **무료로 사용 가능**합니다.
trans-unit.note: First draft: This license __could not be activated__ but Mac Mouse Fix is currently __free in your country__!

다시 입력하십시오.

trans-unit.source:
Activating your license failed for **unknown reasons**
Please write a **Bug Report** [here](https://noah-nuebling.github.io/mac-mouse-fix-feedback-assistant/?type=bug-report)
trans-unit.target:
**알 수 없는 이유**로 라이센스를 활성화하지 못했습니다.
[여기](https://noah-nuebling.github.io/mac-mouse-fix-feedback-assistant/?type=bug-report)에서 **버그 제보**를 작성해주십시오.

First draft: Activate License

trans-unit.source:
Hi there! You've been using Mac Mouse Fix for **%d days** now. I hope you're enjoying it!
If you want to keep using Mac Mouse Fix, you can [buy it now](%@).
trans-unit.target:
안녕하세요! Mac Mouse Fix를 **%d일째** 사용 중입니다.
사용해주셔서 감사드리며, Mac Mouse Fix를 계속 사용하시려면 [구입](%@)해주십시오.
trans-unit.note:
First draft: Hi there! You've been using Mac Mouse Fix for **%d days** now. I hope you're enjoying it!
If you want to keep using Mac Mouse Fix, you can [buy it now](%@).

First draft: Click %@ || Note: %@ will be a button name || Example where %@ is 'Button 5': ⌥⌘ Double Click Button 4 + Click Button 5 || Note: Most of the substrings that are used to build the Action Table Trigger Strings (this is one of those substrings) are capitalized in English because it's common to use 'title case' there. In your language, 'title case' might not be a thing, and so you might not want to capitalize these strings. The first letter of the trigger string will be programmatically capitalized in any language.
First draft: Double Click %@
First draft: Triple Click %@

First draft: Drag || Note: This substring will be emphasized in drag trigger strings like 'Double Click and Drag %@'. Make sure that spelling and capitalization matches exactly for the emphasis to work.
First draft: Click and Drag %@ || Note: %@ will be a button name || example where %@ is 'Button 5': ⌥⌘ Triple Click Button 4 + Click and Drag Button 5
First draft: Double Click and Drag %@
First draft: Triple Click and Drag %@
First draft: and Drag || Note: This will be used for Drag Actions that only need keyboard modifiers to be activated - not mouse buttons || Example: ⌥⌘ and Drag
First draft: Hold %@
First draft: Double Click and Hold %@
First draft: Triple Click and Hold %@

First draft: Scroll || Note: This substring will be emphasized in scroll trigger strings like 'Triple Click and Scroll %@'. Make sure that spelling and capitalization matches exactly for the emphasis to work.
First draft: Click and Scroll %@
First draft: Double Click and Scroll %@
First draft: Triple Click and Scroll %@
First draft: and Scroll || Example: ⌥⌘ and Scroll
First draft: Type a Keyboard Shortcut
